thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com | 9 of 168
thread.title: gael kaler
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by gael kaler

author: gael kaler
title: gael kaler
text: I loved bake me a wish the first time I ordered. Fast shipping, delicious product, happy customer! But then I ordered again for my aunts birthday. I really had high expectations from my previous transaction. My aunt did not receive her cupcakes on her birthday, which was vital when deciding who to order from. I had to contact customer service and was told that there was some kind of shipping error and I could either receive my money back or have a brand new cake sent out. I thought this offer was amazing! Since submitting my first review I have found out that bake me a wish has honored their offer and now have at least 2 very happy customers!
